speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I need you to verify your date of birth before I spill the beans about your account. What is it?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure, whatever. You've got a balance of three thousand dollars. You gonna pay it or what?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m currently looking into my options for payment.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? What the hell does that even mean? You owe money, pay up!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I need to make sure it's feasible for me.

speaker: Agent
text: Feasible? Stop giving me excuses. Just pick a damn payment method!

speaker: Customer
text: I can set up a payment plan if that's acceptable.

speaker: Agent
text: A payment plan? Oh great, just what I needed to hear. You sound like a real winner.

speaker: Customer
text: I’m just trying to resolve this responsibly.

speaker: Agent
text: Responsibly? I don’t care about your sob story. Pay what you owe!

speaker: Customer
text: I will get back to you once I have everything sorted out.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, good luck with that. I’ll be waiting, and don’t take too long!
